articles.title: American women players settle suit vs. U.S. Soccer, secure equal pay - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: U.S. women soccer players reached a landmark agreement with the sport's American governing body to end a six-year legal battle over equal pay, a deal in which they are promised $24 million plus bonuses that match those of the men.
